Data Structures

Here are the data structures with brief descriptions:
ckpt_fdcache_structUsed to optimize access to recently opened files
ckpt_paramParameters for checkpoint/restart
ckpt_sockUsed to encapsulate socket interaction (unused)
headerUsed to serialize a process
memoryEncapsulates a region of physical memory for a process
open_filesRecords information about files being used by a process
open_files_hdrKeeps track of number of files opened by a process
segmentsEncapsulates a region of virtual memory for a process
